body:
I was wondering, if you pay say 19$ for gold, do you have it forever? And if you pay 5$ monthly can you stop it whenever you want?
I'm thinking about getting a rank but I'm a bit confused... Thanks
body_tagged:
I was wondering, if you pay say 19$ for gold, do you have it forever? And if you pay 5$ monthly can you stop it whenever you want?
I'm thinking about getting a rank but I'm a bit confused... Thanks
title: Ranks

replies.body:
What do you mean $19, isn't it $25? Any ways if you if you $5 monthly, you can cancel the subscription via PayPal anytime you want. :)

EDIT: Oh it is discounted. :P Yes if you pay $19 you have it forever. :)
replies.body_tagged:
What do you mean $19, isn't it $25? Any ways if you if you $5 monthly, you can cancel the subscription via PayPal anytime you want. :)

EDIT: Oh it is discounted. :P Yes if you pay $19 you have it forever. :)

replies.body: Ok, thanks, and if you want say an upgrade to get emerald/diamond, would gold just be cancelled?
replies.body_tagged: Ok, thanks, and if you want say an upgrade to get emerald/diamond, would gold just be cancelled?

replies.body: Yup, your gold rank would be replaced with the rank you upgraded too. :)
replies.body_tagged: Yup, your gold rank would be replaced with the rank you upgraded too. :)

reply_to.body: Ok, thanks, and if you want say an upgrade to get emerald/diamond, would gold just be cancelled?
reply_to.body_tagged: Ok, thanks, and if you want say an upgrade to get emerald/diamond, would gold just be cancelled?

replies.body:
Your new rank will also be cheaper because of the Gold rank you have.
(Is this correct?)
replies.body_tagged:
Your new rank will also be cheaper because of the Gold rank you have.
(Is this correct?)

reply_to.body: Yup, your gold rank would be replaced with the rank you upgraded too. :)
reply_to.body_tagged: Yup, your gold rank would be replaced with the rank you upgraded too. :)

replies.body: Nope, you would still have to pay full price for the upgrade. (For example, $75 for an upgrade to Diamond and $25 for an upgrade to Emerald.)
replies.body_tagged: Nope, you would still have to pay full price for the upgrade. (For example, $75 for an upgrade to Diamond and $25 for an upgrade to Emerald.)

reply_to.body:
Your new rank will also be cheaper because of the Gold rank you have.
(Is this correct?)
reply_to.body_tagged:
Your new rank will also be cheaper because of the Gold rank you have.
(Is this correct?)

replies.body: Or you could just buy another gold/emerald and have a sr staff upgrade your rank.
replies.body_tagged: Or you could just buy another gold/emerald and have a sr staff upgrade your rank.

reply_to.body: Nope, you would still have to pay full price for the upgrade. (For example, $75 for an upgrade to Diamond and $25 for an upgrade to Emerald.)
reply_to.body_tagged: Nope, you would still have to pay full price for the upgrade. (For example, $75 for an upgrade to Diamond and $25 for an upgrade to Emerald.)

replies.body: Yes, this is correct. When you upgrade it will show up as a cheaper price instead of having to pay the full $50 or $100.
replies.body_tagged: Yes, this is correct. When you upgrade it will show up as a cheaper price instead of having to pay the full $50 or $100.

reply_to.body:
Your new rank will also be cheaper because of the Gold rank you have.
(Is this correct?)
reply_to.body_tagged:
Your new rank will also be cheaper because of the Gold rank you have.
(Is this correct?)

replies.body:
Also:
If you become a moderator and ban funky you can get this amazing retired rank.
